description: This source file defines a ReminderScheduler class that manages scheduling daily reminder alarms in an Android application using AlarmManager. It handles retrieving and setting reminder times, ensuring a reminder is scheduled, and configuring the alarm with the specified time.

classes.name: ReminderScheduler
classes.description: A class that manages scheduling daily reminders via AlarmManager, including setting reminder times, ensuring default scheduling, and configuring repeating alarms.

methods.name: getReminderTime
methods.description: Retrieves the stored reminder time from SharedPreferences and returns it as a Calendar object set to that time.

methods.name: setReminderTime
methods.description: Stores the specified hour and minute into SharedPreferences for future retrieval.

methods.name: ensureDefaultReminderScheduled
methods.description: Ensures that a reminder is scheduled using the stored reminder time.

methods.name: scheduleDailyReminder
methods.description: Configures and schedules a repeating alarm at the specified hour and minute, adjusting for times that have already passed today.
